include.title: Include Files
include.description: Include other Vulnlog files in this Vulnlog file.

release-groups.title: Release Groups
release-groups.description: Defines the release groups of the product.

releases.title: Releases
releases.description: Defines the releases of the product.

reporter-pipelines.title: Reporter Pipelines
reporter-pipelines.description: Defines the reporter pipelines scanning this product.

reporters.title: Reporters
reporters.description: Defines the reporters of vulnerabilities on the product.

vulnerabilities.title: Vulnerabilities
vulnerabilities.description: Defines the vulnerabilities of the product.

id.title: Release Group Identifier
id.description: Identifier of the Release Group. A release group contains multiple releases under a single name. This allows filtering by release group.

ref-ids.title: Release Identifier
ref-ids.description: Release identifiers that belong to this release group.

id.title: Release Identifier
id.description: Identifier of the release. Must be unique.

release-date.title: Release Date
release-date.description: Date of the release. Format: YYYY-MM-DD.

version.title: Release Version
version.description: Version of the release. For example in the semantic version format: X.Y.Z.

id.title: Reporter Pipeline Identifier
id.description: Identifier of this reporter pipeline. Must be unique.

lifetime.title: Pipeline Lifetime
lifetime.description: From when until when this pipeline is active.

end.title: End date of this pipeline
end.description: Date when this pipeline is no longer active. Format: YYYY-MM-DD

start.title: Start date of this pipeline
start.description: Date from when this pipeline is active. Format: YYYY-MM-DD

reporter-ref-id.title: Reporter
reporter-ref-id.description: Reporter which is used by this pipeline. The reporter's unique identifier is required.

id.title: Reporter Identifier
id.description: Identifier of the reporter. Must be unique. Example: "trivy".

name.title: Reporter Name
name.description: Printable name of the reporter. Example: "OWASP Dependency Check".

vendor.title: Reporter Vendor
vendor.description: An identifier describing the reporter vendor. This identifier should be used later to match predefined templates for suppression files for example.

https://vulnlog.dev/vulnerabilities.anal.title: Vulnlog Vulnerability Analysis Verdict Affected Schema

severity.title: Severity
severity.description: The severity of the impact of this vulnerability on the product.

https://vulnlog.dev/vulnerabilities.anal.title: Vulnlog Vulnerability Analysis Verdict Not Affected Schema

vex.title: VEX Justification
vex.description: The VEX (Vulnerability Exploitability eXchange) justification describes why a component is not affected by a vulnerability. This helps explain the security posture and reasoning behind a 'not affected' verdict.
enum: Vulnerable code cannot be controlled by adversary
Vulnerable code not in execute path

not-affected.title: Not Affected
not-affected.description: The reported vulnerability does not affects the product.

affected.title: Affected
affected.description: The reported vulnerability affects the product.

at.title: Analysis Date
at.description: Date when this vulnerability report was analyzed. When left empty, the date of the first report is used implicitly. Format: YYYY-MM-DD

on-id.title: Analysis for Release
on-id.description: This analysis applies for these releases. If left empty, the analysis applies for all releases.

reasoning.title: Reasoning
reasoning.description: Description of the reasoning behind this analysis.

releases.title: Include Releases
releases.description: When releases are defined in another file, they can be included here.

file.title: File to include
file.description: File containing the releases to be included.

ref-ids.title: Release IDs to Reference from
ref-ids.description: Create a list of references to the release ids defined in the included file. This is useful to create local YAML anchors.

reporters.title: Include Reporters
reporters.description: When reporters are defined in another file, they can be included here.

file.title: File to include
file.description: File containing the reporter to be included.

pipeline-ref-ids.title: Reporter Pipeline References
pipeline-ref-ids.description: Create a list of references to the reporter pipelines ids defined in the included file. This is useful to create local YAML anchors.

reporter-ref-ids.title: Reporter References
reporter-ref-ids.description: Create a list of references to the reporter ids defined in the included file. This is useful to create local YAML anchors.

https://vulnlog.dev/vulnerabilities.repo.title: Vulnlog Vulnerability Report Suppression OWASP Dependency Check Schema

cpe.description: The suppression only applies to artifacts matching these common platform enumerations.

paths.title: Paths
paths.description: The suppression only applies to files matching these paths.

purls.title: Package URL
purls.description: The suppression only applies to packages matching these PURLs.

https://vulnlog.dev/vulnerabilities.repo.title: Vulnlog Vulnerability Report Suppression Snyk Open Source Schema

paths.title: Paths
paths.description: The suppression only applies to files matching these paths.

https://vulnlog.dev/vulnerabilities.repo.title: Vulnlog Vulnerability Report Suppression Trivy Schema

paths.title: Paths
paths.description: The suppression only applies to files matching these paths.

purls.title: Package URL
purls.description: The suppression only applies to packages matching these PURLs.

on.title: Suppress on Releases
on.description: Releases on which this suppression should be applied.

owasp.title: OWASP Dependency Check Suppression
owasp.description: Setups a OWASP Dependency Check suppression.

snyk.title: Snyk Open Source Suppression
snyk.description: Setups a Snyk Open Source suppression.

until.title: Suppress Until
until.description: Date until this suppression should be active to. Format: YYYY-MM-DD

at.title: Reported at Date
at.description: Date on which this report was created. Format: YYYY-MM-DD

on-id.title: Reported Release
on-id.description: Releases on which this vulnerability report applies to.

suppression.title: Suppress Report
suppression.description: Whether this report should be suppressed.

vuln-id.title: Vulnerability ID
vuln-id.description: Identifier of the vulnerability. Can be a CVE or a Snyk ID.

note.title: Note on this Resolution
note.description: Gives additional insight why this resolution was chosen.

on-id.title: Accept on Release
on-id.description: Accept the potential risk of the vulnerability on the given release.

note.title: Note on this Resolution
note.description: Gives additional insight why this resolution was chosen.

on-id.title: Fix on Release
on-id.description: The releases on which this vulnerability should be fixed.

resolved-at.title: Resolved at Date
resolved-at.description: The date on which this resolution is applied. Format: YYYY-MM-DD

note.title: Note on this Resolution
note.description: Gives additional insight why this resolution was chosen.

on-id.title: Rebuild on Release
on-id.description: The releases which should be rebuild.

resolved-at.title: Resolved at Date
resolved-at.description: The date on which this resolution is applied. Format: YYYY-MM-DD

note.title: Note on this Resolution
note.description: Gives additional insight why this resolution was chosen.

on.title: Remove on Release
on.description: The release on which a dependency should be removed.

resolved-at.title: Resolved at Date
resolved-at.description: The date on which this resolution is applied. Format: YYYY-MM-DD

container-dependency.title: Container Dependency
container-dependency.description: The maven dependency in the form of groupId:artifactId:version that should be updated.

dependency.title: Generic Dependency
dependency.description: Define a generic dependency what should be updated. Use this, if the more specific options such as Maven or NPM are not applicable.

maven-dependency.title: Maven Dependency
maven-dependency.description: The maven dependency in the form of groupId:artifactId:version that should be updated.

note.title: Note on this Resolution
note.description: Gives additional insight why this resolution was chosen.

npm-dependency.title: NPM Dependency
npm-dependency.description: The NPM dependency in the form of name@version that should be updated.

on-id.title: Update on Release
on-id.description: The releases a dependency should be updated on.

resolved-at.title: Resolved at Date
resolved-at.description: The date on which this resolution is applied. Format: YYYY-MM-DD

to.title: To Version
to.description: The version to which the dependency should be updated.

accept.title: Accept
accept.description: The potential risk the vulnerability poses to the product is considered acceptable. No further actions are planned. However, the vulnerability might be resolved through another or a future resolution.

fix.title: Fix
fix.description: Fix code parts in the project.

update.title: Update
update.description: Update a dependency to a specific version.

analysis.title: Vulnerability Analysis
analysis.description: Analysis of the vulnerability and assessment of whether and, if so, how problematic the vulnerability is for the product.

cwe.title: Common Weakness Enumeration
cwe.description: The Common Weakness Enumeration (CWE) identifier that represents the type of vulnerability. CWE is a community-developed list of software and hardware weakness types.

desc.title: Vulnerability Description
desc.description: A short summary of the vulnerability and its impact on the product.

reports.title: Vulnerability Reports
reports.description: A list of vulnerability reports, each issues by a reporter.

resolutions.title: Vulnerability Resolutions
resolutions.description: A list of resolutions describing how the vulnerability may be resolved.
